TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Login extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl

summary.span: 提供用户界面 (UI) 元素以便登录网站。

span.span: Provides user interface (UI) elements for logging in to a Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [样式和模板Style and Templates](#styles_and_templates) - [验证分组Validation Groupings](#validation_groupings) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件是一个复合控件，可提供对网站上的用户进行身份验证所需的所有常见 UI 元素。The control is a composite control that provides all the common UI elements needed to authenticate a user on a Web site. 所有登录方案都需要以下三个元素：The following three elements are required for all login scenarios: - 用于标识用户的唯一用户名。A unique user name to identify the user. - 用于验证用户标识的密码。A password to verify the identity of the user. - 用于将登录信息发送到服务器的登录按钮。A login button to send the login information to the server. 控件还提供了以下支持其他函数的可选 UI 元素：The control also provides the following optional UI elements that support additional functions: - 密码提示的链接。A link for a password reminder. - "记住我" 复选框，用于在会话之间保留登录信息。A Remember Me checkbox for retaining the login information between sessions. - 在登录时遇到问题的用户的帮助链接。A Help link for users who are having trouble logging in. - 将用户重定向到注册页的 "注册新用户" 链接。A Register New User link that redirects users to a registration page. - 登录窗体上显示的说明文本。Instruction text that appears on the login form. - 当用户单击 "登录" 按钮时显示的自定义错误文本，不填充 "用户名" 或 "密码" 字段。Custom error text that appears when the user clicks the login button without filling in the user name or password fields. - 登录失败时显示的自定义错误文本。Custom error text that appears if the login fails. - 登录成功后发生的自定义操作。A custom action that occurs when login succeeds. - 如果用户已登录到站点，则为隐藏登录控件的一种方法。A way to hide the login control if the user is already logged in to the site. 有关显示必需的控件和可选的控件的表，请参阅 属性。For a table showing which controls are required and which are optional, see property. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉 ASP.NET 中提供的登录控件集，请参阅[ASP.NET Login Controls 概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178329(v=vs.100))，然后继续。If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178329(v=vs.100)) before continuing. 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员身份管理用户](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tw292whz(v=vs.100))。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tw292whz(v=vs.100)). > [!IMPORTANT] > 接受用户输入是潜在的安全威胁。Accepting user input is a potential security threat. 恶意用户可以发送旨在公开漏洞或运行尝试生成的密码的程序的数据。Malicious users can send data that is intended to expose vulnerabilities or run programs that try generated passwords. 若要在使用用户输入时提高安全性，应使用控件的验证功能并保护为控件配置的任何数据访问接口。To improve security when working with user input, you should use the validation features of your control and secure any data providers that are configured for your control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178346(v=vs.100))、 [Web 应用程序的基本安全实践](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/zdh19h94(v=vs.100))以及[保护成员身份](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178398(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178346(v=vs.100)), [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/zdh19h94(v=vs.100)), and [Securing Membership](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178398(v=vs.100)). 控件使用成员资格提供程序来获取用户凭据。The control uses a membership provider to obtain user credentials. 除非另行指定，否则 控件将使用 web.config 文件中定义的默认成员资格提供程序。Unless you specify otherwise, the control uses the default membership provider defined in the Web.config file. 若要指定其他提供程序，请将 属性设置为应用程序的 web.config 文件中定义的成员资格提供程序名称之一。To specify a different provider, set the property to one of the membership provider names defined in your application's Web.config file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[成员资格提供程序](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/sx3h274z(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Membership Providers](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/sx3h274z(v=vs.100)). 如果要使用自定义身份验证服务，可以使用 方法来调用服务。If you want to use a custom authentication service, you can use the method to call the service. ## 样式和模板Styles and Templates 控件的外观可通过模板和样式设置完全自定义。The appearance of the control is fully customizable through templates and style settings. 还可以通过 类的属性自定义所有 UI 文本消息。All UI text messages are also customizable through properties of the class. 默认的接口文本会根据服务器上的区域设置自动进行本地化。The default interface text is automatically localized based on the locale setting on the server. 如果 控件是利用模板自定义的，则将忽略 属性和 属性。If the control is customized with templates, then the property and the property are ignored. 在这种情况下，请直接设置每个模板子控件的 属性和 属性。In this case, set the property and the property of each template child control directly. 文本框所表示 控件属性，如 和 ，在页面生命周期的所有阶段都可以访问。 control properties represented by text boxes, such as and , are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle. 控件将通过由文本框触发的 事件来选取最终用户所做的任何更改。The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the event triggered by the textboxes. > [!NOTE] > 如果将 控件嵌入 对象中，如果用户经过身份验证，则在 `Page_Load` 事件处理程序中显式设置 属性。If you embed the control in a object, explicitly set the property in a `Page_Load` event handler if the user is authenticated. 在此方案中， 控件不会自动前进到下一个 对象。The control does not automatically advance to the next object in this scenario. 下表列出了 控件样式属性，并说明了每个样式属性影响的 UI 元素。The following table lists the control style properties and explains which UI element each style property affects. 有关每种样式应用于的属性的列表，请参阅各个样式属性的文档。For a list of which properties each style applies to, see the documentation for the individual style properties. |Style 属性Style property|受影响的 UI 元素UI element affected| |--------------------|-------------------------| ||控件内容和控件的边框之间的空间。The space between the control contents and the control's border.| ||"记住我" 复选框。Remember Me checkbox.| ||登录失败文本。Login failure text.| ||页面上告知用户如何使用控件的说明文本。Instructional text on the page that tells users how to use the control.| ||所有输入字段（如文本框）的标签。Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.| ||文本输入字段。Text entry input fields.| ||标题文本。Title text.| ||由于验证错误而导致登录尝试失败时向用户显示的文本。Text displayed to the user when a login attempt is unsuccessful due to validation errors.| ||指向其他页面的链接。Links to other pages.| ||"登录" 按钮。Login button.| ## 验证分组Validation Groupings 和 属性都具有与之关联的 控件，以防止用户提交页面，而不提供所需的信息。The and properties have controls associated with them to prevent users from submitting the page without providing required information. 控件使用验证组，以便可以单独验证同一页上与 控件相同的其他字段。The control uses a validation group so that other fields on the same page as the control can be validated separately. 默认情况下， 控件的 属性用作验证组的名称。By default, the property of the control is used as the name of the validation group. 例如，ID 为 "Login1" 的 控件将使用验证组名称 "Login1"。For example, a control with the ID "Login1" will use a validation group name of "Login1". 如果要设置 控件所属的验证组，则必须为该控件设置模板并更改验证组名称。If you want to set the validation group that the control is part of, you must template the control and change the validation group name. ## 应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles 利用 控件，你可以在标记中指定 CSS 样式规则。The control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup. 如果使用模板来自定义 控件的外观，则可以在模板的标记中指定 CSS 样式。If you use templates to customize the appearance of the control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates. 在这种情况下，不需要额外的外部表。In that case, no extra outer table is required. 您可以通过将 属性设置为 `false`来阻止呈现该表。You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the property to `false`. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140))和[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                    ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 控件提供用于登录到网站的 UI。The following code example uses a control to provide a UI for logging in to a Web site. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginClass/CS/loginclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginClass/VB/loginclassvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展 控件。The following code example demonstrates how you can extend the control. `CustomLogin` 控件包括一个 控件，该控件使用户可以选择要使用其进行身份验证的成员资格提供程序。The `CustomLogin` control includes a control that lets users choose which membership provider they are authenticated with. （这些提供程序在 web.config 中进行配置。）在 方法中， 属性设置为 控件的选定值。(These providers are configured in Web.config.) In the method, the property is set to the selected value of the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Controls.CustomLogin#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Controls.CustomLogin/CS/FarmasLogin.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Controls.CustomLogin#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Controls.CustomLogin/VB/FarmasLogin.vb#1)]

summary.span: 验证用户的身份后出现。

span.span: Occurs when a user is authenticated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户使用 控件登录到网站时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when a user uses the control to log in to a Web site. 自定义身份验证方案可以使用 事件来对用户进行身份验证。Custom authentication schemes can use the event to authenticate users. > [!NOTE] > 当用户使用 控件登录到网站时，视图状态和所有 post 数据中的所有数据都将丢失。When a user uses the control to log in to a Web site, all data in the view state and all post data is lost. 不要在依赖于视图状态的 事件中执行操作。Do not perform actions in the event that rely on the view state. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 事件来调用特定于站点的自定义身份验证代码。The following code example uses the event to call site-specific custom authentication code. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginAuthenticate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginAuthenticate/CS/loginauthenticatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginAuthenticate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginAuthenticate/VB/loginauthenticatevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: A reference to the that defines the style settings for the control's Remember Me check box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取对 对象的引用，使用该对象可更改 控件的 "记住我" 复选框的外观。The property gets a reference to a object that you use to change the appearance of the control's Remember Me check box. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置它返回的 对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 您可以以声明方式设置这些属性 `Property-Subproperty`，其中 `Subproperty` 表示 类的属性（例如 `CheckBoxStyle-ForeColor`）。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CheckBoxStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以以编程方式在 `Property.Subproperty` 格式设置属性（例如，`CheckBoxStyle.ForeColor`）。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CheckBoxStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置包括自定义背景色、文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性定义 属性的外观。The property defines the appearance of the property. 属性的样式设置与 控件的样式设置进行合并。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在 属性中所做的任何设置都将覆盖 控件的属性中的相应设置。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下 控件样式属性被 设置重写：The following control style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - - - - 使用模板定义 控件的外观时， 属性不起作用。When you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过设置 属性所引用的 对象的属性，将 "记住我" 复选框的文本颜色设置为蓝色，将字体样式设置为斜体。The following code example sets the text color of the Remember Me check box to blue and the font style to italic by setting properties of the object referenced by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginCheckBoxStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginCheckBoxStyle/CS/logincheckboxstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginCheckBoxStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginCheckBoxStyle/VB/logincheckboxstylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含指向网站注册页的链接的文本。The property contains the text of a link to the registration page for the site. 注册页的 URL 在 属性中指定。The URL of the registration page is specified in the property. 如果 为空，则将向用户显示 属性中的文本，但不会将其格式设置为链接。If is empty, the text in the property is displayed to the user, but is not formatted as a link. 如果 属性为空，则用户不能使用注册页面的链接。If the property is empty, a link to the registration page is not available to the user. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为 "注册新用户 ..."The following code example sets the property to "Register new user..." > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginCreateUserText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginCreateUserText/CS/logincreateusertextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginCreateUserText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginCreateUserText/VB/logincreateusertextvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定登录尝试成功时显示的页面。The property specifies the page that is displayed when a login attempt is successful. 控件的默认行为是将用户返回到引用页，或返回到 web.config 文件中元素的 `defaultUrl` 属性中定义的页。The default behavior of the control is to return the user to the referring page, or to the page defined in the `defaultUrl` attribute of the element in the Web.config file. 属性将重写 控件的默认行为，以及在配置文件中所做的 `defaultUrl` 设置。The property overrides the default behavior of the control, as well as the `defaultUrl` setting made in the configuration file. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置 属性。The following code example sets the property. Page_Load 方法用于将引用页的 URL 附加到目标页的 URL，以便目标页可以根据需要将用户返回到原始页。The Page_Load method is used to attach the URL of the referring page to the URL of the destination page so that the destination page can return the user to the original page if desired. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示复选框以使用户可以控制是否向浏览器发送持久性 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display a check box to enable the user to control whether a persistent cookie is sent to their browser.

value.span: 如果显示复选框，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to display the check box; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为 `true`时， 属性中包含的文本会显示在页面上，同时还会显示 "记住我" 复选框。When the property is set to `true`, the text contained in the property is displayed on the page, along with a Remember Me check box. 当用户选中 "记住我" 复选框时，发送到其计算机的身份验证 cookie 会保持不变，以便在将来访问站点时自动对用户进行身份验证。When the user selects the Remember Me check box, the authentication cookie sent to his or her computer persists so that the user is automatically authenticated on future visits to the site. 属性的值由 "记住我" 复选框中的选定内容设置。The value of the property is set by the selection in the Remember Me check box. 如果 `false`，则不会在页面上显示 "记住我" 复选框，并且用户无法控制是否保留身份验证 cookie。If is `false`, a Remember Me check box is not displayed on the page and the user has no way to control whether the authentication cookie persists or not. 你仍可以将 属性设置为 `true` 将永久性身份验证 cookie 发送到用户的浏览器，而不显示复选框。You can still set the property to `true` to send a persistent authentication cookie to the user's browser without displaying the check box. > [!NOTE] > 在用户的浏览器上设置持久性身份验证 cookie 存在固有的安全风险。There are inherent security risks with setting a persistent authentication cookie on a user's browser. 你应确定你的站点是否可以接受这些安全风险。You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site. 如果将 属性设置为 `true` 并将 属性设置为 `false`，则从公共浏览器访问你的网站的用户（例如在 Internet 咖啡馆中）可能会意外地留下永久性的身份验证 cookie，并且浏览器的下一个用户将能够使用以前用户的凭据访问你的网站。If you set the property to `true` and the property to `false`, users visiting your Web site from public browsers, as in Internet cafes for example, can accidentally leave persistent authentication cookies behind and the next user of the browser will be able to access your Web site using the previous user's credentials. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过将 属性设置为 `false`来禁用 "记住我" 复选框。The following code example disables the Remember Me check box by setting the property to `false`. summary.span: 获取或设置当登录尝试失败时显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text displayed when a login attempt fails.

value.span: 当登录尝试失败时向用户显示的文本。

span.span: The text to display to the user when a login attempt fails.

value.span: 默认值为“您的登录尝试失败。

span.span: The default is "Your login attempt has failed.
Please try again."

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定当登录尝试失败时显示的字符串。The property specifies the string that is displayed when a login attempt fails. 如果为 控件定义模板，则可以通过使用 控件并为该控件提供 ID "FailureText" 来指示模板上的哪些位置显示 属性。If you define a template for the control, you can indicate where on the template to display the property by using a control and giving that control the ID "FailureText". 使用模板时， 属性不会应用于 属性中指定的文本。When you use a template, the property is not applied to the text specified in the property. 属性的默认文本根据服务器当前的区域设置进行本地化。The default text for the property is localized based on the server's current locale. > [!NOTE] > 出于安全原因，登录失败文本不应包含失败的特定原因。For security reasons, the login failure text should not include a specific reason for the failure. 例如，错误消息（如 "用户 \<用户名 > 的密码无效"）会向潜在攻击者显示 \<用户名 > 是系统上的用户。For example, an error message such as "Password not valid for user \" reveals to a potential attacker that \ is a user on the system. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：显示安全错误消息](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/994a1482(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [How to: Display Safe Error Messages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/994a1482(v=vs.100)). 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为 "在登录时出错。The following code example sets the property to "There was an error while logging you in. 请重试。 "。Please try again.". remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可获取对 对象的引用，使用该对象可以更改登录失败文本的外观。The property gets a reference to a object that you use to change the appearance of login failure text. 默认值为以红色显示文本。The default is to display the text in red. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置它返回的 对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 您可以以声明方式设置这些属性 `Property-Subproperty`，其中 `Subproperty` 表示 类的属性（例如 `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`）。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以以编程方式在 `Property.Subproperty` 格式设置属性（例如，`FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`）。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置包括自定义背景色、文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性定义 属性的外观。The property defines the appearance of the property. 属性的样式设置与 控件的样式设置进行合并。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在 属性中所做的任何设置都将覆盖 控件的属性中的相应设置。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下 控件样式属性被 设置重写：The following control style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - - - - 使用模板定义 控件的外观时， 属性不起作用。When you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过设置 属性中引用的 对象的背景和文本颜色属性，来指定登录失败文本样式。The following code example specifies the login failure text style by setting the background and text color properties of the object referenced in the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义 控件中的说明文本的外观。The property defines the appearance of instruction text in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置它返回的 对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 您可以以声明方式设置这些属性 `Property-Subproperty`，其中 `Subproperty` 表示 类的属性（例如 `InstructionTextStyle-ForeColor`）。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `InstructionTextStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以以编程方式在 `Property.Subproperty` 格式设置属性（例如，`InstructionTextStyle.ForeColor`）。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `InstructionTextStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置包括自定义背景色、文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性定义 属性的外观。The property defines the appearance of the property. 属性的样式设置与 控件的样式设置进行合并。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在 属性中所做的任何设置都将覆盖 控件的属性中的相应设置。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下 样式属性被 设置重写：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - - - - 使用模板定义 控件的外观时， 属性不起作用。When you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过设置 属性所引用的 对象的属性，来设置说明文本和说明文本的背景色。The following code example sets the instruction text and the background color for the instruction text by setting properties of the object referenced by the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含定义如何向用户显示 控件的模板。The property contains the template that defines how the control is displayed to the user. 下表列出了 控件模板中使用的必选和可选控件。The following table lists the required and optional controls used in a control template. |ID 或命令名称ID or command name|控件类型Control type|必需/可选Required/optional| |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`UserName`|实现 的任何控件，包括 或自定义或第三方控件。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|必需Required| |`Password`|实现 的任何控件，包括 或自定义或第三方控件。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|必需Required| |`RememberMe`||可选Optional| |`FailureText`|实现 的任何控件。Any control that implements .|可选Optional| |`Login`|导致事件冒泡的任何控件。Any control that causes event bubbling.|可选Optional| 如果布局模板不包含所需控件， 控件将引发 异常。The control throws an exception if the layout template does not contain the required controls. 如果将可选控件 ID 赋给错误类型的控件，则不会引发异常;但 控件随后将忽略该控件。No exception is thrown if you give an optional control ID to a control of the wrong type; however, the control is subsequently ignored by the control. 登录控件可以是导致事件冒泡的任何控件，如 、或 。The login control can be any control that causes event bubbling, such as , , or . 控件的命令名称属性必须设置为 "Login"。The control's command name property must be set to "Login". 当模板用于 控件时，只有以下属性会影响控件的行为：When a template is used for the control, only the following properties affect the behavior of the control: - 继承自 的所有属性。All properties inherited from . （有关详细信息，请参阅 控件成员表。）(For details, see the control members table.) - 列中的一个值匹配。. - 列中的一个值匹配。. - 列中的一个值匹配。. - 列中的一个值匹配。. - 列中的一个值匹配。. - 列中的一个值匹配。. - 列中的一个值匹配。. - 列中的一个值匹配。. 如果为 控件设置了模板，则所有其他属性都处于非活动状态。All other properties are inactive when a template is set for the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建 控件的模板。The following code example creates a template for the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). summary.span: 在用户登录到网站并进行身份验证后出现。

span.span: Occurs when the user logs in to the Web site and has been authenticated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当身份验证提供程序检查用户的凭据，并且身份验证 cookie 已排队以在下一次响应中发送到浏览器时，将引发 事件。The event is raised after the authentication provider checks the user's credentials and the authentication cookie is queued to send to the browser in the next response. 在对用户进行身份验证后，可以使用 事件提供其他处理，如访问每用户数据。Use the event to provide additional processing, such as accessing per-user data, after the user is authenticated. 当用户提交其登录信息时， 控件首先引发 事件、 事件，最后引发 事件。When a user submits his or her login information, the control first raises the event, then the event, and finally the event. > [!NOTE] > 当用户使用 控件登录到网站时，视图状态和所有 post 数据中的所有数据都将丢失。When a user uses the control to log in to a Web site, all data in the view state and all post data is lost. 不要在依赖于视图状态的 事件中执行操作。Do not perform actions in the event that rely on the view state. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 事件来调用保留用户登录记录的特定于站点的方法。The following code example uses the event to call a site-specific method that keeps a record of user logins. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginAfterLogin#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginAfterLogin/CS/loginafterlogincs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginAfterLogin#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginAfterLogin/VB/loginafterloginvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在用户未进行身份验证而提交登录信息时出现。

span.span: Occurs when a user submits login information, before authentication takes place.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户提交登录信息，但在网站上对用户进行身份验证之前，将引发 事件。The event is raised when a user submits login information but before the user is authenticated on the Web site. 在对用户进行身份验证之前，请使用 事件设置所需的任何信息。Use the event to set up any information that you need before authenticating a user. 您可以通过将 对象的 属性设置为 `true`，取消在 事件期间进行的登录尝试。You can cancel a login attempt during the event by setting the property of the object to `true`. 引发 事件后， 控件将引发 事件，然后引发 事件。After the event is raised, the control raises the event and then the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 事件确保用户在 属性中输入了格式正确的电子邮件地址。The following code example uses the event to ensure that the user has entered a well-formed email address in the property. 否则， 事件将取消登录尝试，并使用 属性显示错误消息。If not, the event cancels the login attempt and displays an error message using the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginBeforeLogin#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginBeforeLogin/CS/loginbeforelogincs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginBeforeLogin#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginBeforeLogin/VB/loginbeforeloginvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含为 控件的 "登录" 按钮显示的文本。The property contains the text displayed for the control's login button. 根据 属性的值， 属性可以在按钮上显示为文本，作为文本显示为不会呈现图像的浏览器中的图像或链接文本。Depending on the value of the property, the property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image in browsers that do not render images, or as the text of a link. 下表描述了不同 值对 属性的影响。The following table describes how the different values affect the property. | 设置 setting|如何使用 属性。How the property is used.| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||作为按钮的 `Text` 属性。As the button's `Text` property.| ||作为图像的替代文本。As alternative text for the image.| ||作为链接文本。As link text.| 控件的默认文本根据服务器当前的区域设置进行本地化。The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 属性中的文本如何受到 属性的值的影响。The following code example shows how the text in the property is affected by the value of the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含站点的密码恢复页链接的文本。The property contains the text of a link to the password recovery page for the site. 密码恢复页的 URL 在 属性中指定。The URL of the password recovery page is specified in the property. 如果 为空，则将向用户显示 属性中的文本，但不会将其格式设置为链接。If is empty, the text in the property is displayed to the user, but is not formatted as a link. 如果 属性为空，则用户无法使用 "密码恢复" 页的链接。If the property is empty, the link to the password recovery page is not available to the user. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置 属性以指定到站点的密码恢复页的链接的文本。The following code example sets the property to specify the text of the link to the site's password recovery page. 该示例显示一个登录窗体，并设置 和 属性。The example displays a login form and sets the and properties. 如果用户单击 "忘记了密码"，则将显示 getPass 页。If the user clicks "Forgot your password", the getPass.aspx page is displayed. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将持久性身份验证 Cookie 发送到用户的浏览器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to send a persistent authentication cookie to the user's browser.

value.span: 如果发送持久性身份验证 Cookie，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to send a persistent authentication cookie; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `true` 属性时，发送到用户的计算机的身份验证 cookie 设置为在50年后过期，使其成为在用户下一次访问网站时使用的永久性 cookie。When the property is `true`, the authentication cookie sent to the user's computer is set to expire in 50 years, making it a persistent cookie that will be used when the user next visits the Web site. 由于身份验证 cookie 会出现在用户的计算机上，因此，用户将被视为已通过身份验证，并且无需再次登录到网站。Because the authentication cookie will be present on the user's computer, the user will be considered already authenticated and will not have to log in to the Web site again. 当 `true` 属性时， 属性设置为向用户显示的复选框的值。When the property is `true`, the property is set to the value of the check box displayed to the user. 如果 `false` 属性，则不会在页面上显示 "记住我" 复选框，并且用户无法控制身份验证 cookie 是否是永久性的。If the property is `false`, a Remember Me check box is not displayed on the page and the user has no way to control whether the authentication cookie is persistent. 如果 `true` 属性，则发送到用户浏览器的身份验证 cookie 将为永久性 cookie。If the property is `true`, the authentication cookie sent to the user's browser will be a persistent cookie. 如果用户使用 控件从网站注销，则会从用户的计算机中清除永久性 cookie，用户在下次访问时必须登录到站点。If the user logs out of the Web site using the control, the persistent cookie is cleared from the user's computer and the user will have to log in to the site on the next visit. > [!NOTE] > 在用户的浏览器上设置持久性身份验证 cookie 存在固有的安全风险。There are inherent security risks with setting a persistent authentication cookie on a user's browser. 你应确定你的站点是否可以接受这些安全风险。You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site. 如果将 属性设置为 `true` 并将 属性设置为 `false`，则从公共浏览器访问你的网站的用户（例如在 Internet 咖啡馆中）可能会意外地留下永久性的身份验证 cookie，并且浏览器的下一个用户将能够使用以前用户的凭据访问你的网站。If you set the property to `true` and the property to `false`, users visiting your Web site from public browsers, as in Internet cafes for example, can accidentally leave persistent authentication cookies behind and the next user of the browser will be able to access your Web site using the previous user's credentials. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

value.span: 对 的引用，它包含定义文本框外观的属性。

span.span: A reference to the that contains properties that define the appearance of text boxes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义 控件中的用户名和密码 控件的外观。The property defines the appearance of the User name and Password controls in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置它返回的 对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 您可以以声明方式设置这些属性 `Property-Subproperty`，其中 `Subproperty` 表示 类的属性（例如 `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`）。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以以编程方式在 `Property.Subproperty` 格式设置属性（例如，`TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`）。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置包括自定义背景色、文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性定义 "用户名" 和 "密码" 文本框的外观。The property defines the appearance of the user name and password text boxes. 属性的样式设置与 控件的样式设置进行合并。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在 属性中所做的任何设置都将覆盖 控件的属性中的相应设置。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下 样式属性被 设置重写：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - - - - 使用模板定义 控件的外观时， 属性不起作用。When you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过设置 属性所引用的 对象的属性，设置用户名和密码 控件的背景和文本颜色。The following code example sets the background and text colors of the User name and Password controls by setting properties on the object referenced by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取对 对象的引用，使用该对象可以更改 属性中包含的标题的外观。The property gets a reference to a object that you use to change the appearance of the title contained in the property. 属性定义 控件中标题的外观。The property defines the appearance of the title in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置它返回的 对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 您可以以声明方式设置这些属性 `Property-Subproperty`，其中 `Subproperty` 表示 类的属性（例如 `TitleStyle-ForeColor`）。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `TitleStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以以编程方式在 `Property.Subproperty` 格式设置属性（例如，`TitleStyle.ForeColor`）。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `TitleStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置包括自定义背景色、文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性定义 属性的外观。The property defines the appearance of the property. 属性的样式设置与 控件的样式设置进行合并。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在 属性中所做的任何设置都将覆盖 控件的属性中的相应设置。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下 样式属性被 设置重写：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - - - - 使用模板定义 控件的外观时， 属性不起作用。When you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过设置 属性引用的 对象的属性来设置标题的文本颜色、背景色和字体粗细。The following code example sets the text color, background color, and font weight of the title by setting properties of the object referenced by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginTitleText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginTitleText/CS/logintitletextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginTitleText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginTitleText/VB/logintitletextvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含用户输入的用户名。The property contains the user name entered by the user. 文本框所表示 控件属性，如 和 ，在页面生命周期的所有阶段都可以访问。 control properties represented by text boxes, such as and , are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle. 控件将通过由文本框触发的 事件来选取最终用户所做的任何更改。The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the event triggered by the textboxes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性传递给自定义身份验证方法。The following code example passes the property to a custom authentication method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含 文本框的标签文本。The property contains the label text for the text box. 属性定义字段标签的位置。The property defines where the field label is positioned. 控件的默认文本根据服务器当前的区域设置进行本地化。The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 属性。The following code example demonstrates setting the property. summary.span: 获取或设置当用户名字段为空时在 控件中显示的错误消息。

span.span: Gets or sets the error message to display in a control when the user name field is left blank.

value.span: 当用户名字段为空时在 控件中显示的错误消息。

span.span: The error message to display in a control when the user name field is left blank.
The default is "User Name."

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含登录页上 控件中显示的错误消息。The property contains the error message displayed in a control on the login page. 仅当以下两个条件都为 true 时，才显示 属性值：The property value is displayed only when both the following conditions are true: - 页面上存在 控件。A control is present on the page. - 用户的 "用户名" 文本框留空。The User name text box is left blank by the user. 控件的默认文本根据服务器当前的区域设置进行本地化。The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). 和 值都包装在 控件中的验证组内。Both the and values are wrapped in a validation group within the control. 要使这些值显示， 控件的 属性必须设置为 控件的 属性。For these values to display, the property of the control must be set to the property of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件显示在 属性中指定的错误消息。The following code example demonstrates using a control to display the error message specified in the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginRequiredErrorMessage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginRequiredErrorMessage/CS/loginrequirederrormessagecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginRequiredErrorMessage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginRequiredErrorMessage/VB/loginrequirederrormessagevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取对 属性集合的引用，这些属性定义与 控件使用的验证程序关联的错误消息的外观。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of error messages associated with validators used by the control.
A containing the style settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可通过 属性进行自定义的样式设置。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |设置Setting|说明Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|错误消息后面的颜色。The color behind the error messages. 颜色可以是 的任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|错误消息周围边框的颜色。The color of the border around the error messages. 颜色可以是 的任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|错误消息周围边框的样式。The style of the border around the error messages. 样式可以是 "None"、"虚线"、"虚线"、"实线"、"Double"、"沟"、"凸"、"内陷" 或 "外嵌"。The style can be "None", "Dotted", "Dashed", "Solid", "Double", "Groove", "Ridge", "Inset", or "Outset". 默认值为 "NotSet"。The default is "NotSet". 某些样式不会清晰显示，除非 `BorderWidth` 值大于2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|错误消息周围边框的宽度。The width of the border around the error messages.| |`CssClass`|用于呈现错误消息的级联样式表（CSS）类。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the error messages. 如果指定了其他设置，则它们将重写样式表设置。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 以粗体显示错误消息文本。`true` to display the error message text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 以斜体类型显示错误消息文本。`true` to display the error message text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 在其上方显示错误消息文本。`true` to display the error message text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|作为 对象的错误消息中的文本大小。The size of the text in the error messages as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true`，则显示超出的错误消息文本。`true` to display the error message text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true`，则使用下划线显示错误消息文本。`true` to display the error message text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|错误消息中的文本颜色。The color of the text in the error messages. 颜色可以是 的任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|一个 对象，该对象表示错误消息的高度。A object that represents the height of the error messages.| |`Width`|一个 对象，该对象表示错误消息的宽度。A object that represents the width of the error messages.|

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在验证用户身份后是否显示 控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the control after the user is authenticated.

value.span: 如果在验证用户身份后隐藏 控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control should be hidden when the user is authenticated; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定是否向经过身份验证的用户显示 控件。The property specifies whether the control is displayed to authenticated users. 如果 `false`属性，则当经过身份验证的用户访问站点时， 控件不会出现在该页上。When the property is `false`, the control does not appear on the page when an authenticated user accesses the site. 这适用于在用户身份验证后用作登录页和信息页以隐藏 控件的网页。This is used on Web pages that are used both as login pages and as information pages to hide the control after the user has been authenticated. 属性对出现在 web.config 中或应用程序配置文件中定义的默认登录页上的 控件不起作用。The property has no effect on a control that appears on the default login page defined in Web.config or in the application's configuration file. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为 `true` 以指定 控件不隐藏并且始终显示在页上，不管用户是否已经过身份验证。The following code example sets the property to `true` to specify that the control is not hidden and is always displayed on the page, regardless of whether the user has been authenticated. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginHideWhenLoggedIn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginHideWhenLoggedIn/CS/loginhidewhenloggedincs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginHideWhenLoggedIn#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginHideWhenLoggedIn/VB/loginhidewhenloggedinvb.aspx#1)]
